message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

This paper deals with natural language processing and specifically focuses on word sense disambiguation in Hindi language. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language) which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also involves the use of machine learning algorithms for evaluation, which makes cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) likely categories. Additionally, the paper involves the analysis of lexical associations, which falls under the category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper deals with the enrichment of the sense-tagged Hindi corpus, which falls under the category of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
